title: Using yardlistr
text: First , need export eBird data. receive email zip file. extracted, data comma-separated format (.csv). Yardlistr always choose last .csv file data directory ascending alphanumeric order. example illustrates file selection. Say following three files data directory: ascending alphanumeric order, file 2022-08-02_ebird.csv last thus used yardlistr.

title: Using yardlistr
text: folder structure set , can run yardlistr. location name must exactly eBird. can also set list multiple locations pass yardlistr one one.
code: library(yardlistr)  yardlistr("My Location", "path/to/data_directory", "path/to/output_directory") dir_input <- "./dir_data" dir_output <- "./dir_plots"  list_locations <- c(   "My yard",   "My friend's yard",   "My local hotspot" )  list_locations |> purrr::walk(   \(location) yardlistr::yardlistr(location, dir_input, dir_output) )

title: Using yardlistr
text: frequency plot lists observed species specified location descending order bar representing percentage complete checklists particular species occurs . Species observed incidental checklists frequency 0.0%.

title: Using yardlistr
text: heatmap plot closely modeled eBird’s bar chart. given species, displays percentage checklists (complete incidental) species occurs tetrad year. higher frequency species certain tetrad , darker colour . month consists four tetrads comprise following days month: 1st - 7th, 8th - 14th, 15th - 21st, 22nd - last.

title: Using yardlistr
text: species per list plot showcases trajectory number species location life list versus number checklists location. ways, resembles rarefaction curve.

title: Using yardlistr
text: plot similar species per list plot instead shows number species location life list developed time. Depending regularly observe birds location, two plots can look less similar.

title: Using yardlistr
text: time day plot shows distribution checklists throughout day.

title: Generate Summary Plots from eBird Data
text: yardlistr package reads eBird data produces number different plots specified location, e.g. yard (hence package name) Warning: package development provided without guarantees. lacks flexibility robustenss various aspects. questions, issues suggestions, feel free open GitHub issue pull request.

what: Calculate tetrad from a datetime — tetrad
title: Calculate tetrad from a datetime — tetrad
text: tetrad one four parts month. Since months multiple week long (except February non-leap years), tetrads length days.

title: Calculate tetrad from a datetime — tetrad
Calculate tetrad from a datetime — tetrad
text: x Vector datetimes. method Method calculate tetrad. ebird (default): "ebird" method takes day 1-7 tetrad 1, 8-14 tetrad 2, 15-21 tetrad 3 >21 tetrad 4. method employed Cornell Lab Ornithology bar charts eBird platform fourths: "fourths" method divides month four tetrads close equal length possible. month 30 days consists tetrads length 7, 8, 7 8 order. month 28 days consist tetrads length 7
